src:
Epska statistika Luke Dončića: 87+34+37 u tri meča (VIDEO)
Slovenački as napravio ozbiljan iskorak u drugoj NBA sezoni

07 Nov 2019

Dalas je nastavio seriju dobrih rezultata, ali bez tripl-dabla Luke Dončića! Navikao je slovenački vunderkind košarkašku javnost na vanserijske predstave u svojoj drugoj NBA sezoni i lestvicu podigao do neslućenih visina, ali čak i kada nema tripl-dabla, Dončić izgleda brutalno na parketu. U tesnoj pobedi nad Orlandom rezultatom 107:106 Dončić je skupio 27 poena i po sedam uhvaćenih i podeljenih lopti, čime je postigao nešto što malo koji 20-godišnjak ima u svom rezimeu.
Naime, Dončić je u poslednje tri utakmice na neverovatnih 87 poena, 34 skoka i 37 asistencija, što je tripl-dabl prosek sa 29 poena, 11,3 uhvaćenih i 12,3 podeljenih lopti! Koliki je pomak napred u svojoj igri ostvario Luka Dončić pokazuje i podatak da mu statistički svega 0,5 asistencija nedostaje da bi imao tripl-dabl prosek za celu dosadašnju sezonu! Luka je trenutno na 26,7 poena, 10,3 skokova i 9,5 asistencija, uz 1,5 ukradenih lopti i 3,2 pogođene trojke po utakmici! Njegov minimum ove sezone je 25-6-6, što je u istoriji NBA lige uspelo samo Lebronu Džejmsu pre 21. rođendana!



Ono što, ipak, dodatno oduševljava američku košarkašku publiku jeste dubina rostera kojom raspolaže trener Rik Karlajl. Čak šestorica igrača meč su završili s dvocifrenim učinkom. Maksi Kleber je imao 14, Tim Hardavej 13, Dvajt Pauel 12, Džastin Džekson 11, a Kristaps Porzingis 10 poena, uz osam skokova. Boban Marjanović je odigrao tek nešto manje od dva minuta, bez učinka...
Što se utakmice tiče, imala je potpuno dramatičnu završnicu... Posle ofanzivnog skoka Nikole Vučevića Aron Gordon je uspeo da položi loptu i Orlando dovede na samo poen zaostatka (107:106). Bilo je to na tačno 69 sekundi pre kraja. Od tog momenta Gordon je uspeo da skrivi faul u napadu, Luka da izgubi posed, da bi onda Gordon ponovo napravio istu glupost i tako presudio svom timu. Da stvari budu još zanimljivije Set Kari nije uspeo da iskoristi nijedno slobodno bacanje, posle čega su gosti imali 6,6 sekundi da overe brejk. Odlučili su se za pokušaj Vučevića za tri poena, što se nije najbolje završilo...
U redovima Orlanda Gordon je imao 23 poena, a Vučević 19 poena, uz 11 skokova i sedam asistencija.



Najzanimljiviji meč prethodne noći odigrali su Klipersi i Baksi. Gosti su slavili s rezultatom 129:124 uz 38 poena i 16 skokova Janisa Adetokunba, koga je ispratio Džordž Hil s 24 poena. Baksi su pogodili čak 18 trojki, od kojih je upravo Hil ubacio čak šest. Adetokunbu je promakao tripl-dabl za jednu asistenciju, ali je beležio bar deset skokova i pet asistencija u svakoj od uvodnih osam utakmica sezone, što se nikome nije dogodilo u poslednjih 47 godina.
Klipersi su meč igrali bez Kavaja Lenarda koji je dobio još jedan meč odmora, a planirano je da igra protiv Portlanda u četvrtak. Montrezl Herel je postavio rekord karijere sa 34 poena i 13 skokova, dok je Lu Vilijams takođe imao 34 poena, ali uz 11 asistencija. Patrik Beverli je imao 20 poena i 10 skokova.




NBA – rezultati

Detroit – Njujork 122:102/Dramond 27 – Rendl 20/
Indijana – Vašington 121:106/Voren 21 – Bil 30/
Atlanta – Čikago 93:113/Parker 18 – Satoranski 27/
Hjuston – Golden Stejt 129:112/Harden 36 – Burks 28/
Toronto – Sakramento 124:120/Lauri 24 – Barns 26/
Memfis – Minesota 137:121/Bruks 31 – Vigins 30/
Dalas – Orlando 107:106/Dončić 27 – Gordon 23/
Juta – Filadelfija 106:104/Mičel 24 – Embid 27/
LA Klipers – Milvoki 124:129/Vilijams 34 – Adetokunbo 38/

text:
Luka Doncic's epic stats: 87 + 34 + 37 in three matches (VIDEO)
The Slovenian ace made a serious leap forward in another NBA season

07 Nov 2019

Dallas continued the series with good results, but without Luka Doncic's triple-double! He has used the Slovenian wunderkind basketball public to perform outside his second NBA season and lift the ladder to unprecedented heights, but even when he has no triple-double, Doncic looks brutal on the floor. In a tight win over Orlando with a score of 107: 106 Doncic collected 27 points and seven intercepted and divided balls, achieving something the 20-year-old has in his resume.
Specifically, Doncic is averaging 87 points, 34 rebounds and 37 assists in his last three games, which is a triple-double average with 29 points, 11.3 catches and 12.3 split balls! How much progress Luka Luka has made in his game is shown by the fact that he has statistically just 0.5 assists missing in order to have a triple-double average for the whole season so far! Luke is currently at 26.7 points, 10.3 rebounds and 9.5 assists, with 1.5 steals and 3.2 strikeouts per game! His minimum this season is 25-6-6, which in NBA history only managed for Lebron James before his 21st birthday!



However, what further captivates the American basketball audience is the depth of roster available to coach Rick Carlisle. As many as six players ended the match with double digits. Maxi Kleber had 14, Tim Hardaway 13, Dwight Powell 12, Justin Jackson 11, and Kristaps Porzingis 10 points, with eight rebounds. Boban Marjanovic played just under two minutes with no effect ...
As for the match, it had a completely dramatic finish ... After Nikola Vucevic's offensive rebound, Aaron Gordon managed to lay the ball and bring Orlando to just one point behind (107: 106). It was exactly 69 seconds before the end. From that moment, Gordon was able to hide the foul in the attack, Luke losing possession, and then Gordon again made the same nonsense and thus ruled his team. To make things even more interesting, Set Kari failed to use any free throws, after which the guests had 6.6 seconds to validate the break. They decided to try Vucevic for three points, which did not end well ...
In Orlando, Gordon had 23 points and Vucevic 19 points, with 11 rebounds and seven assists.



The most interesting match of the previous night was played by the Clippers and Bucks. The guests celebrated with a score of 129: 124 with 38 points and 16 rebounds by Janis Adetokunb, followed by George Hill with 24 points. The Bucks hit as many as 18 threes, of which Hill scored as many as six. Adetokunbu promoted a triple-double for one assist, but recorded at least ten rebounds and five assists in each of the opening eight games of the season, which has not happened to anyone in the last 47 years.
The Clippers played the match without Kawaii Lenard getting another rest match, scheduled to play against Portland on Thursday. Montrezl Herel set a career record with 34 points and 13 rebounds, while Lou Williams also had 34 points but with 11 assists. Patrick Beverly had 20 points and 10 rebounds.




NBA - Results

Indiana - Washington 121: 106 / Warren 21 - Bill 30 /
Atlanta - Chicago 93: 113 / Parker 18 - Satoran 27 /
